name: places/ChIJ83jJ9opYwokR1Vnrow3SI_E
formattedAddress: 135 W 70th St, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 135 W 70th St, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text:
My cousin referred me to Dr. Sonia Gidwani, who is located in the heart of the Upper West Side in NYC, is truly a standout pediatrician. We felt assured that our child was in capable and caring hands. Dr. Gidwani exemplifies professionalism coupled with immense knowledge in pediatric medicine, making each visit enlightening and reassuring.

Her approach to care is holistic and individualized, ensuring that each child’s unique needs are addressed thoroughly. She takes the time to listen attentively to our concerns and questions, providing comprehensive and understandable explanations and recommendations. Her genuine concern and dedication to her little patients’ well-being are evident in every interaction.

Beyond her medical expertise, Dr. Gidwani’s warm and approachable demeanor has made every visit a pleasant experience. The office staff is equally commendable, offering friendly and efficient service, making appointment scheduling and follow-ups a breeze.

We feel incredibly fortunate to have found such a dedicated and compassionate pediatrician for our child. Dr. Gidwani’s exceptional care has been pivotal in fostering our child’s health and development, and we highly recommend her services to any parent seeking top-notch pediatric care in NYC.

originalText.text:
Dr. Gidwani is first-class.

Amazing, well-rounded physician. Extremely knowledgeable, great communicator, and caring bedside manner.

text.text:
Dr. Gidwani is first-class.

Amazing, well-rounded physician. Extremely knowledgeable, great communicator, and caring bedside manner.

originalText.text:
All parents please be on alert this pediatrician is all talk based on her strong prejudice and opinion disguised as she is an advocate for the child. Don’t be fooled by initial impressions from her act that she is caring. Her office staff is also rude and lazy and gets upset at parent for asking if Dr Gidwani is running really late and if needs to reschedule during hour long or longer delay that she has caused. Also her office is nasty looks like it hasn’t been cleaned in decades and my young girl got a skin infection after touching something in their waiting room.

Dr Gidwani has denied to provide healthcare services that my children had with a previous pediatrician before we moved to UWS NYC where Dr Gidwani waved their disease off as not important and claimed it doesn’t happen in children. Even after repeated requests she dismissed me and the children treating us like were bothering her and wasting her time when she saw us over an hour late.

We switched from her to a more well-trained pediatrician and found out both my girls need medical attention that was ignored by Dr Gidwani. She is not at all respected by other doctors and that is why she practices by herself. She is medically dangerous and should not be practicing however she gains trust in the family pretending that she is a protector of children and an advocate for their access to healthcare. She will also speak to the children planting false ideas in their head that they are being abused by the parents and encourages them to hide and withhold  information not only healthcare but in general from their parents again disguising her unethical practice as protecting child healthcare privacy however in truth she is breaking child parent trust and bond and creating problems in the family so she can feel like a hero. She has also given us wrong medical information about immunization and posed safety issues because of her incompetency. Dr Gidwani uses her practice to build herself up as a hero of children to compensate for her personal issues where she knows she is not a competent medical professional and distract the parents from finding out she is a poorly trained doctor.

Dr Gidwani seems to have personal issues where she hates adults and parents and tolerates them but every chance she gets she tries to replace the child’s bond with their parent with telling them they can tell her anything that the child would not tell the parents and that she will keep it a secret between her and child. It’s something a child abuser says. What kind of doctor and pediatrician does that! Parents don’t get fooled like I did at first with her outgoing personality that she’s good for your child. Find a better doctor as there are other good ones in NYC.

originalText.text: There could not be a better name for this practice! Dr. G truly treats her patients like they are her own kids! She is so loving, kind, practical and knowledgeable. My 3 year old began to look forward to seeing her for visits and so did my husband and I! We just moved out of the city and are SO sad to lose her as our pediatrician! I couldn't recommend her more!

originalText.text: we've been with Our Kids MD since the birth of our little girl. The medical staff as well as the front desk have been kind, efficient and professional. Dr. Gidwani is highly experienced, is very patient and encouracing to (new) parents and was of course great with our child. Highly recommended.
